requirements.summary: Create professional homepage with hero section showcasing Lasereraa as an industrial laser cutting organization with lasereraa.com domain prominently displayed
acceptanceCriteria: Domain name 'lasereraa.com' is visible in header or footer
Hero section has sharp, professional industrial aesthetic

file_operations.description: Transform the application into a single-page marketing site for Lasereraa. Replace existing content with a new component structure that includes Header (with lasereraa.com domain), Hero section featuring the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/laser-cutting-hero.dim_1200x600.png, Services section, Products section, and Contact section. Implement smooth scroll navigation between sections.

Create a header component displaying the Lasereraa company name prominently using the generated logo frontend/public/assets/generated/lasereraa-logo.dim_400x400.png and the domain name lasereraa.com. Include navigation links to Services, Products, and Contact sections with smooth scrolling. Apply industrial design aesthetic with metallic tones and clean typography.

Create a hero section component featuring the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/laser-cutting-hero.dim_1200x600.png as a background or prominent visual element. Include a headline emphasizing Lasereraa's industrial laser cutting expertise, a subheadline about precision manufacturing, and a call-to-action button linking to the contact section. Use sharp, professional styling with geometric elements and industrial aesthetic.
Create a footer component displaying the lasereraa.com domain, company name, and basic footer information. Use industrial design styling consistent with the header.

requirements.summary: Create services section displaying laser cutting capabilities for metal, MDF, and acrylic materials with clear descriptions
acceptanceCriteria: Services section lists laser cutting for metal
Services section lists laser cutting for MDF
Services section lists laser cutting for acrylic
Each service has a brief description

file_operations.description: Create a services section component displaying three laser cutting service categories: metal cutting, MDF cutting, and acrylic cutting. Each service should include a title, descriptive text highlighting capabilities and precision, and use the generated images frontend/public/assets/generated/acrylic-precision.dim_800x600.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/facility-background.dim_1920x1080.png where appropriate. Use a card-based layout with sharp lines and industrial styling. Include technical details and benefits for each material type.

requirements.summary: Create products section showcasing corporate gift items and customizable gift offerings with visual presentation
acceptanceCriteria: Products section displays corporate gift items category
Products section displays customizable gift items category
Visual grid or card layout for product presentation

file_operations.description: Create a products section component showcasing two main categories: corporate gift items and customizable gift items. Use the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/corporate-gifts.dim_800x600.png to illustrate the offerings. Implement a visual grid or card layout displaying product examples with brief descriptions. Include text emphasizing customization capabilities and laser engraving precision. Apply industrial design aesthetic with clean presentation.

requirements.summary: Implement sharp, industrial design theme with precision-focused visual elements reflecting manufacturing aesthetics using metallic tones, clean lines, and technical typography
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses industrial color palette with metallic or technical tones
Layout features sharp lines and geometric elements
Visual style is consistent across all sections

file_operations.description: Update global styles to implement an industrial design theme. Define CSS custom properties for metallic color palette (steel grays, dark blues, metallic silvers, accent oranges for laser cutting effects). Set base typography to clean, technical sans-serif fonts. Add utility classes for sharp geometric borders, precision-focused spacing, and industrial visual effects. Ensure all generated images integrate seamlessly with the theme.

Extend Tailwind configuration with industrial theme colors (metallic grays, steel blues, laser orange accents), custom fonts optimized for technical/industrial aesthetic, and design tokens for sharp borders, shadows, and geometric elements. Configure theme to support the precision-focused visual language throughout all components.

requirements.summary: Create contact section with company information and call-to-action for inquiries about laser cutting services and gift items
acceptanceCriteria: Contact section is visible on the page
Section includes call-to-action for service inquiries
Domain lasereraa.com is referenced in contact information

file_operations.description: Create a contact section component with a prominent call-to-action encouraging inquiries about laser cutting services and corporate gifts. Display the lasereraa.com domain name clearly. Include placeholder contact information fields (email, phone) and a brief message about getting in touch for custom projects. Use industrial styling consistent with the overall theme. No form submission functionality is required - this is informational only.
